alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Clay; Floyd; Knott; Lee; Leslie; Letcher; Martin; Owsley; Perry; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 16 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM EST THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall from repeated showers and thunderstorms is possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky, northeast Kentucky, south central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Estill, Menifee and Powell. In northeast Kentucky, Johnson and Martin. In south central Kentucky, Laurel, McCreary, Pulaski, Rockcastle, Wayne and Whitley. In southeast Kentucky, Bell, Breathitt, Clay, Floyd, Harlan, Jackson, Knott, Knox, Lee, Leslie, Letcher, Magoffin, Morgan, Owsley, Perry, Pike and Wolfe. * WHEN...From 6 AM EST this morning through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread showers will affect the area today into tonight, with times of thunderstorms also expected. Heavy rainfall will likely result, bringing significant rises on area creeks and streams. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Clay; Floyd; Knott; Lee; Leslie; Letcher; Martin; Owsley; Perry; Pike
